ResearchProjectDef.label: Modular Automatroid
ResearchProjectDef.description: These massive machines were purpose built for full-scale warfare amongst nations. Unlocks various assault Automatroids which took inspiration from old-war vehicles and technology, but with a modernized twist.

ResearchProjectDef.label: assault equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: These massive machines were purpose built for full-scale warfare amongst nations. Unlocks various assault Automatroids which took inspiration from old-war vehicles and technology, but with a modernized twist.

ResearchProjectDef.label: FSR munition
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows to create ammo, that creates spark streams and flame blast at the impact position.

ResearchProjectDef.label: beam focusing
ResearchProjectDef.description: These massive machines were purpose built for full-scale warfare amongst nations. Unlocks various assault Automatroids which took inspiration from old-war vehicles and technology, but with a modernized twist.

ResearchProjectDef.label: "Overlord" project
ResearchProjectDef.description: Project "Overlord" was developed by an almost independent branch of one of the colonial fleets. When Renegade Crisis began they decided to join separatists, providing advanced command Automatroids for growing renegades army. Allows for the construction of advanced self-aware command Automatroids.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->found destroyed renegades facility with survived data
subject_story->deserted from Colonial fleet to find better place for research
subject_story->collected a large amount of historical documents about Renegade Crisis
subject_gerund->thinking about the weakness of mass production
